articles.title: Macron's cognac — the only thing that went down smoothly with Xi - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Xi Jinping handed Emmanuel Macron some wins during his state visit, but offered few meaningful concessions on trade and Ukraine
articles.content:
“We oppose using the Ukraine crisis to cast blame, smear a third country and incite a new Cold War,” Xi said on Monday.
